issue.title: [C++] Add function execution API for a preconfigured kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17613](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17613). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the function execution API goes through kernel selection on each invocation. This issue will add a faster-path for executing a preconfigured kernel.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17613?focusedCommentId=17631684) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14043
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14043>
